Sentencas: Lanthanum gallate doped with strontium and magnesium (LSGM) is a promising electrolyte system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: The reported formation of interfacial layers in monolithic type SOFCs based on lanthanum gallate is of concern because of its impact on the performance of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: Planar anode-supported SOFC elements (without the cathode) were prepared by the tape casting technique in order to determine the nature of the anode/ electrolyte interface after sintering.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: Two anode systems were studied, one a NiO-CeO2 cermet, and the other, a modified lanthanum gallate anode containing manganese.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: Sintering studies were conducted at 1250, 1300, 1350, 1400 and 1450 degreesC to determine the effect of temperature on the interfacial characteristics.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) revealed a significant diffusion of Ni from the NiO-CeO2 anode resulting in the formation of an interfacial layer regardless of sintering temperature.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: Significant La diffusion from the electrolyte into the anode was also observed.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Sentencas: In the case of the modified lanthanum gallate anode containing manganese, there was no interfacial layer formation, but a significant diffusion of Mn into the electrolyte was observed.
Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements
Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements

Titulo: Interfacial layers in tape cast anode-supported doped lanthanum gallate SOFC elements
